## Shape.GetCharacters method

Returns all Characters objects that represents a range of characters within the text .

```csharp
public ArrayList GetCharacters()
```

### Return Value

All Characters objects

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
ArrayList list = shape.GetCharacters();
```
